name: This is a disaster
description:
IMPORTANT:  If you are playing the web version, please use fullscreen to get the full experience!

This is a 2D RPG Parody with natural disasters coming your way! Be sure to dodge all incoming disasters and speak to the MOST annoying npc.

Features

  • Shop and Quest System
  • 'Realistic' Hunger and Thirst Mechanic
  • Coin System

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • E to use item / interact

(Note: the suggested donation is just a joke although donations are greatly appreciated and also I am so sorry I cant make a build for Windows.)
